    • Constructor Detail

      • BerkeleyKVStorePlugin

        @Inject
public BerkeleyKVStorePlugin​(String collections,
                             String dbFilePath,
                             VTransactionManager transactionManager,
                             CodecManager codecManager)
        Constructor. Collections syntax : - collections are comma separated a revoir (param √©tendus - collections may defined TimeToLive and Memory configs with a json like syntax : collName;TTL=10;inMemory - TTL default to -1 meaning eternal - inMemory default to false meaning store on file system
        Parameters:
        collections - List of collections managed by this plugin (comma separated)
        dbFilePath - Base Berkeley DB file system path (Could use java env param like user.home user.dir or java.io.tmpdir)
        transactionManager - Transaction manager
        codecManager - Codec manager
